
2024-09-15

# Chief Complaint
- Frequent Urination
- Fatigue
- Thirst


# History of Present Illness
Fritz267
 is a 73 year-old nonhispanic native male. Patient has a history of gingival disease (disorder), chronic kidney disease stage 3 (disorder), medication review due (situation), leaking dental filling (finding), drug overdose, victim of intimate partner abuse (finding), viral sinusitis (disorder), chronic kidney disease stage 4 (disorder), part-time employment (finding), chronic kidney disease stage 2 (disorder), not in labor force (finding), limited social contact (finding), chronic kidney disease stage 1 (disorder), primary dental caries (disorder), reports of violence in the environment (finding), full-time employment (finding), awaiting transplantation of kidney (situation), gingivitis (disorder), stress (finding), social isolation (finding).

# Social History
Patient is married. Patient has a documented history of opioid addiction. Patient has never smoked.
 Patient identifies as heterosexual.

Patient comes from a middle socioeconomic background.
 Patient has completed some college courses.
Patient currently has Medicare.

# Allergies
No Known Allergies.

# Medications
lisinopril 10 mg oral tablet; 1 ml epoetin alfa 4000 unt/ml injection [epogen]; 10 ml furosemide 10 mg/ml injection; 1 ml tacrolimus 5 mg/ml injection; insulin lispro 100 unt/ml injectable solution [humalog]; 24 hr tacrolimus 1 mg extended release oral tablet; furosemide 40 mg oral tablet; amoxicillin 250 mg / clavulanate 125 mg oral tablet; sodium fluoride 0.0272 mg/mg oral gel

# Assessment and Plan


## Plan

The following procedures were conducted:
- echocardiography (procedure)
- medication reconciliation (procedure)



2024-09-02

# Chief Complaint
- Frequent Urination
- Fatigue
- Thirst


# History of Present Illness
Fritz267
 is a 73 year-old nonhispanic native male. Patient has a history of gingival disease (disorder), chronic kidney disease stage 3 (disorder), medication review due (situation), leaking dental filling (finding), drug overdose, victim of intimate partner abuse (finding), viral sinusitis (disorder), chronic kidney disease stage 4 (disorder), part-time employment (finding), chronic kidney disease stage 2 (disorder), not in labor force (finding), limited social contact (finding), chronic kidney disease stage 1 (disorder), primary dental caries (disorder), reports of violence in the environment (finding), full-time employment (finding), awaiting transplantation of kidney (situation), gingivitis (disorder), stress (finding), social isolation (finding).

# Social History
Patient is married. Patient has a documented history of opioid addiction. Patient has never smoked.
 Patient identifies as heterosexual.

Patient comes from a middle socioeconomic background.
 Patient has completed some college courses.
Patient currently has Medicare.

# Allergies
No Known Allergies.

# Medications
lisinopril 10 mg oral tablet; 1 ml epoetin alfa 4000 unt/ml injection [epogen]; 10 ml furosemide 10 mg/ml injection; 1 ml tacrolimus 5 mg/ml injection; insulin lispro 100 unt/ml injectable solution [humalog]; 24 hr tacrolimus 1 mg extended release oral tablet; furosemide 40 mg oral tablet; amoxicillin 250 mg / clavulanate 125 mg oral tablet; sodium fluoride 0.0272 mg/mg oral gel

# Assessment and Plan


## Plan

The following procedures were conducted:
- dental consultation and report (procedure)
- dental care (regime/therapy)
- removal of supragingival plaque and calculus from all teeth using dental instrument (procedure)
- removal of subgingival plaque and calculus from all teeth using dental instrument (procedure)
- dental plain x-ray bitewing (procedure)
- examination of gingivae (procedure)
- dental fluoride treatment (procedure)
- oral health education (procedure)
The patient was prescribed the following medications:
- sodium fluoride 0.0272 mg/mg oral gel

# History of Present Illness
Fritz267
 is a 73 year-old nonhispanic native male. Patient has a history of gingival disease (disorder), chronic kidney disease stage 3 (disorder), medication review due (situation), leaking dental filling (finding), drug overdose, victim of intimate partner abuse (finding), viral sinusitis (disorder), chronic kidney disease stage 4 (disorder), part-time employment (finding), chronic kidney disease stage 2 (disorder), not in labor force (finding), limited social contact (finding), chronic kidney disease stage 1 (disorder), primary dental caries (disorder), reports of violence in the environment (finding), full-time employment (finding), awaiting transplantation of kidney (situation), gingivitis (disorder), stress (finding), social isolation (finding).

 Patient identifies as heterosexual.

Patient comes from a middle socioeconomic background.
 Patient has completed some college courses.
Patient currently has Medicare.

# Allergies
No Known Allergies.

# Medications
lisinopril 10 mg oral tablet; 1 ml epoetin alfa 4000 unt/ml injection [epogen]; 10 ml furosemide 10 mg/ml injection; 1 ml tacrolimus 5 mg/ml injection; insulin lispro 100 unt/ml injectable solution [humalog]; 24 hr tacrolimus 1 mg extended release oral tablet; furosemide 40 mg oral tablet; amoxicillin 250 mg / clavulanate 125 mg oral tablet; sodium fluoride 0.0272 mg/mg oral gel

# Assessment and Plan
Patient is presenting with stress (finding). 

## Plan
Patient was given the following immunizations: influenza, seasonal, injectable, preservative free. 
The following procedures were conducted:
- assessment of health and social care needs (procedure)
- assessment of anxiety (procedure)
- assessment using morse fall scale (procedure)
- depression screening (procedure)
- depression screening (procedure)
- patient referral for dental care (procedure)
The patient was prescribed the following medications:
- furosemide 40 mg oral tablet
- 24 hr tacrolimus 1 mg extended release oral tablet
- insulin lispro 100 unt/ml injectable solution [humalog]
- lisinopril 10 mg oral tablet

Fritz267
 is a 72 year-old nonhispanic native male. Patient has a history of gingival disease (disorder), chronic kidney disease stage 3 (disorder), medication review due (situation), leaking dental filling (finding), drug overdose, victim of intimate partner abuse (finding), viral sinusitis (disorder), chronic kidney disease stage 4 (disorder), part-time employment (finding), chronic kidney disease stage 2 (disorder), not in labor force (finding), limited social contact (finding), chronic kidney disease stage 1 (disorder), primary dental caries (disorder), reports of violence in the environment (finding), full-time employment (finding), awaiting transplantation of kidney (situation), gingivitis (disorder), stress (finding), social isolation (finding).

# Social History
Patient is married. Patient has a documented history of opioid addiction. Patient has never smoked.
 Patient identifies as heterosexual.

Patient comes from a middle socioeconomic background.

Patient currently has Medicare.

Patient has a history of gingival disease (disorder), chronic kidney disease stage 3 (disorder), medication review due (situation), leaking dental filling (finding), drug overdose, victim of intimate partner abuse (finding), viral sinusitis (disorder), chronic kidney disease stage 4 (disorder), part-time employment (finding), chronic kidney disease stage 2 (disorder), not in labor force (finding), limited social contact (finding), chronic kidney disease stage 1 (disorder), primary dental caries (disorder), reports of violence in the environment (finding), full-time employment (finding), awaiting transplantation of kidney (situation), gingivitis (disorder), stress (finding), social isolation (finding).

# Social History
Patient is married. Patient has a documented history of opioid addiction. Patient has never smoked.
 Patient identifies as heterosexual.

Patient comes from a middle socioeconomic background.
 Patient has completed some college courses.
Patient currently has Medicare.

# Allergies
No Known Allergies.

# Medications
lisinopril 10 mg oral tablet; 1 ml epoetin alfa 4000 unt/ml injection [epogen]; 10 ml furosemide 10 mg/ml injection; 1 ml tacrolimus 5 mg/ml injection; insulin lispro 100 unt/ml injectable solution [humalog]; 24 hr tacrolimus 1 mg extended release oral tablet; furosemide 40 mg oral tablet; amoxicillin 250 mg / clavulanate 125 mg oral tablet; sodium fluoride 0.0272 mg/mg oral gel

Patient has a history of gingival disease (disorder), chronic kidney disease stage 3 (disorder), medication review due (situation), leaking dental filling (finding), drug overdose, victim of intimate partner abuse (finding), viral sinusitis (disorder), chronic kidney disease stage 4 (disorder), part-time employment (finding), chronic kidney disease stage 2 (disorder), not in labor force (finding), limited social contact (finding), chronic kidney disease stage 1 (disorder), primary dental caries (disorder), reports of violence in the environment (finding), full-time employment (finding), awaiting transplantation of kidney (situation), gingivitis (disorder), stress (finding), social isolation (finding).

# Social History
Patient is married. Patient has a documented history of opioid addiction. Patient has never smoked.
 Patient identifies as heterosexual.

Patient comes from a middle socioeconomic background.
 Patient has completed some college courses.
Patient currently has Medicare.

# Allergies
No Known Allergies.

Patient has a history of gingival disease (disorder), chronic kidney disease stage 3 (disorder), medication review due (situation), leaking dental filling (finding), drug overdose, victim of intimate partner abuse (finding), viral sinusitis (disorder), chronic kidney disease stage 4 (disorder), part-time employment (finding), chronic kidney disease stage 2 (disorder), not in labor force (finding), limited social contact (finding), chronic kidney disease stage 1 (disorder), primary dental caries (disorder), reports of violence in the environment (finding), full-time employment (finding), awaiting transplantation of kidney (situation), gingivitis (disorder), stress (finding), social isolation (finding).

# Social History
Patient is married. Patient has a documented history of opioid addiction. Patient has never smoked.
 Patient identifies as heterosexual.

Patient comes from a middle socioeconomic background.
 Patient has completed some college courses.
Patient currently has Medicare.

Fritz267
 is a 70 year-old nonhispanic native male. Patient has a history of gingival disease (disorder), chronic kidney disease stage 3 (disorder), medication review due (situation), leaking dental filling (finding), drug overdose, victim of intimate partner abuse (finding), viral sinusitis (disorder), chronic kidney disease stage 4 (disorder), part-time employment (finding), chronic kidney disease stage 2 (disorder), not in labor force (finding), limited social contact (finding), chronic kidney disease stage 1 (disorder), primary dental caries (disorder), reports of violence in the environment (finding), full-time employment (finding), awaiting transplantation of kidney (situation), gingivitis (disorder), stress (finding), social isolation (finding).

# Medications
lisinopril 10 mg oral tablet; 1 ml epoetin alfa 4000 unt/ml injection [epogen]; insulin lispro 100 unt/ml injectable solution [humalog]; amoxicillin 250 mg / clavulanate 125 mg oral tablet; sodium fluoride 0.0272 mg/mg oral gel

# Assessment and Plan


## Plan

The following procedures were conducted:
- renal dialysis (procedure)
The patient was prescribed the following medications:
- 1 ml epoetin alfa 4000 unt/ml injection [epogen]



2020-11-19

# Chief Complaint
- Frequent Urination
- Fatigue
- Thirst


# History of Present Illness
Fritz267
 is a 69 year-old nonhispanic native male. Patient has a history of gingival disease (disorder), chronic kidney disease stage 3 (disorder), medication review due (situation), leaking dental filling (finding), drug overdose, victim of intimate partner abuse (finding), viral sinusitis (disorder), chronic kidney disease stage 4 (disorder), part-time employment (finding), chronic kidney disease stage 2 (disorder), not in labor force (finding), limited social contact (finding), chronic kidney disease stage 1 (disorder), primary dental caries (disorder), reports of violence in the environment (finding), full-time employment (finding), awaiting transplantation of kidney (situation), gingivitis (disorder), stress (finding), social isolation (finding).

# Social History
Patient is married. Patient has a documented history of opioid addiction. Patient has never smoked.
 Patient identifies as heterosexual.

Patient comes from a middle socioeconomic background.
 Patient has completed some college courses.
Patient currently has Medicare.

# Chief Complaint
- Frequent Urination
- Fatigue
- Thirst


# History of Present Illness
Fritz267
 is a 69 year-old nonhispanic native male. Patient has a history of gingival disease (disorder), chronic kidney disease stage 3 (disorder), medication review due (situation), leaking dental filling (finding), drug overdose, victim of intimate partner abuse (finding), viral sinusitis (disorder), chronic kidney disease stage 4 (disorder), part-time employment (finding), chronic kidney disease stage 2 (disorder), not in labor force (finding), limited social contact (finding), chronic kidney disease stage 1 (disorder), primary dental caries (disorder), reports of violence in the environment (finding), full-time employment (finding), awaiting transplantation of kidney (situation), gingivitis (disorder), stress (finding), social isolation (finding).

# Social History
Patient is married. Patient has a documented history of opioid addiction. Patient has never smoked.
 Patient identifies as heterosexual.

Patient comes from a middle socioeconomic background.
 Patient has completed some college courses.
Patient currently has Medicare.

# Allergies
No Known Allergies.

# Medications
lisinopril 10 mg oral tablet; 1 ml epoetin alfa 4000 unt/ml injection [epogen]; insulin lispro 100 unt/ml injectable solution [humalog]; amoxicillin 250 mg / clavulanate 125 mg oral tablet; sodium fluoride 0.0272 mg/mg oral gel

Patient has a history of gingival disease (disorder), chronic kidney disease stage 3 (disorder), medication review due (situation), leaking dental filling (finding), drug overdose, victim of intimate partner abuse (finding), viral sinusitis (disorder), chronic kidney disease stage 4 (disorder), part-time employment (finding), chronic kidney disease stage 2 (disorder), not in labor force (finding), limited social contact (finding), chronic kidney disease stage 1 (disorder), primary dental caries (disorder), reports of violence in the environment (finding), full-time employment (finding), awaiting transplantation of kidney (situation), gingivitis (disorder), stress (finding), social isolation (finding).

# Social History
Patient is married. Patient has a documented history of opioid addiction. Patient has never smoked.
 Patient identifies as heterosexual.

Patient comes from a middle socioeconomic background.
 Patient has completed some college courses.
Patient currently has Medicare.

# Allergies
No Known Allergies.

# Medications
lisinopril 10 mg oral tablet; 1 ml epoetin alfa 4000 unt/ml injection [epogen]; insulin lispro 100 unt/ml injectable solution [humalog]; amoxicillin 250 mg / clavulanate 125 mg oral tablet; sodium fluoride 0.0272 mg/mg oral gel

# Assessment and Plan


## Plan

Patient is married. Patient has a documented history of opioid addiction. Patient has never smoked.
 Patient identifies as heterosexual.

Patient comes from a middle socioeconomic background.
 Patient has completed some college courses.
Patient currently has Medicare.

# Allergies
No Known Allergies.

# Medications
lisinopril 10 mg oral tablet; 1 ml epoetin alfa 4000 unt/ml injection [epogen]; insulin lispro 100 unt/ml injectable solution [humalog]; amoxicillin 250 mg / clavulanate 125 mg oral tablet; sodium fluoride 0.0272 mg/mg oral gel

Patient has a history of gingival disease (disorder), chronic kidney disease stage 3 (disorder), medication review due (situation), leaking dental filling (finding), drug overdose, victim of intimate partner abuse (finding), viral sinusitis (disorder), chronic kidney disease stage 4 (disorder), part-time employment (finding), chronic kidney disease stage 2 (disorder), not in labor force (finding), limited social contact (finding), chronic kidney disease stage 1 (disorder), primary dental caries (disorder), reports of violence in the environment (finding), full-time employment (finding), awaiting transplantation of kidney (situation), gingivitis (disorder), stress (finding), social isolation (finding).

# Social History
Patient is married. Patient has a documented history of opioid addiction. Patient has never smoked.
 Patient identifies as heterosexual.

Patient comes from a middle socioeconomic background.
 Patient has completed some college courses.
Patient currently has Medicare.

# Allergies
No Known Allergies.

# Medications
lisinopril 10 mg oral tablet; 1 ml epoetin alfa 4000 unt/ml injection [epogen]; insulin lispro 100 unt/ml injectable solution [humalog]; amoxicillin 250 mg / clavulanate 125 mg oral tablet; sodium fluoride 0.0272 mg/mg oral gel

# Assessment and Plan


## Plan

The following procedures were conducted:
- renal dialysis (procedure)
The patient was prescribed the following medications:
- 1 ml epoetin alfa 4000 unt/ml injection [epogen]

Fritz267
 is a 68 year-old nonhispanic native male. Patient has a history of gingival disease (disorder), chronic kidney disease stage 3 (disorder), medication review due (situation), leaking dental filling (finding), drug overdose, victim of intimate partner abuse (finding), chronic kidney disease stage 4 (disorder), part-time employment (finding), chronic kidney disease stage 2 (disorder), not in labor force (finding), limited social contact (finding), chronic kidney disease stage 1 (disorder), primary dental caries (disorder), reports of violence in the environment (finding), full-time employment (finding), awaiting transplantation of kidney (situation), gingivitis (disorder), stress (finding), social isolation (finding).

# Social History
Patient is married. Patient has a documented history of opioid addiction. Patient has never smoked.
 Patient identifies as heterosexual.

Patient comes from a middle socioeconomic background.
 Patient has completed some college courses.
Patient currently has Medicare.

# Allergies
No Known Allergies.

# Medications
lisinopril 10 mg oral tablet; 1 ml epoetin alfa 4000 unt/ml injection [epogen]; insulin lispro 100 unt/ml injectable solution [humalog]; sodium fluoride 0.0272 mg/mg oral gel

lisinopril 10 mg oral tablet; 1 ml epoetin alfa 4000 unt/ml injection [epogen]; insulin lispro 100 unt/ml injectable solution [humalog]; sodium fluoride 0.0272 mg/mg oral gel

2019-01-02

# Chief Complaint
- Frequent Urination
- Fatigue
- Thirst


# History of Present Illness
Fritz267
 is a 68 year-old nonhispanic native male. Patient has a history of gingival disease (disorder), chronic kidney disease stage 3 (disorder), medication review due (situation), leaking dental filling (finding), drug overdose, victim of intimate partner abuse (finding), chronic kidney disease stage 4 (disorder), part-time employment (finding), chronic kidney disease stage 2 (disorder), not in labor force (finding), limited social contact (finding), chronic kidney disease stage 1 (disorder), primary dental caries (disorder), full-time employment (finding), awaiting transplantation of kidney (situation), gingivitis (disorder), stress (finding), social isolation (finding).

# Social History
Patient is married. Patient has a documented history of opioid addiction. Patient has never smoked.
 Patient identifies as heterosexual.

Patient comes from a middle socioeconomic background.
 Patient has completed some college courses.
Patient currently has Medicare.

# Allergies
No Known Allergies.

# Medications
lisinopril 10 mg oral tablet; 1 ml epoetin alfa 4000 unt/ml injection [epogen]; insulin lispro 100 unt/ml injectable solution [humalog]; sodium fluoride 0.0272 mg/mg oral gel

# Assessment and Plan


## Plan

The following procedures were conducted:
- renal dialysis (procedure)
The patient was prescribed the following medications:
- 1 ml epoetin alfa 4000 unt/ml injection [epogen]

Patient has a history of gingival disease (disorder), chronic kidney disease stage 3 (disorder), medication review due (situation), leaking dental filling (finding), drug overdose, victim of intimate partner abuse (finding), chronic kidney disease stage 4 (disorder), part-time employment (finding), chronic kidney disease stage 2 (disorder), not in labor force (finding), limited social contact (finding), chronic kidney disease stage 1 (disorder), primary dental caries (disorder), full-time employment (finding), awaiting transplantation of kidney (situation), gingivitis (disorder), stress (finding), social isolation (finding).

# Social History
Patient is married. Patient has a documented history of opioid addiction. Patient has never smoked.
 Patient identifies as heterosexual.

Patient comes from a middle socioeconomic background.
 Patient has completed some college courses.
Patient currently has Medicare.

# Allergies
No Known Allergies.

# Medications
lisinopril 10 mg oral tablet; 1 ml epoetin alfa 4000 unt/ml injection [epogen]; insulin lispro 100 unt/ml injectable solution [humalog]; sodium fluoride 0.0272 mg/mg oral gel

# Assessment and Plan


## Plan

The following procedures were conducted:
- renal dialysis (procedure)
The patient was prescribed the following medications:
- 1 ml epoetin alfa 4000 unt/ml injection [epogen]

# Assessment and Plan


## Plan

The following procedures were conducted:
- dental consultation and report (procedure)
- dental care (regime/therapy)
- removal of supragingival plaque and calculus from all teeth using dental instrument (procedure)
- removal of subgingival plaque and calculus from all teeth using dental instrument (procedure)
- examination of gingivae (procedure)
- dental fluoride treatment (procedure)
- oral health education (procedure)
The patient was prescribed the following medications:
- sodium fluoride 0.0272 mg/mg oral gel

Patient has a history of gingival disease (disorder), chronic kidney disease stage 3 (disorder), medication review due (situation), leaking dental filling (finding), drug overdose, victim of intimate partner abuse (finding), chronic kidney disease stage 4 (disorder), part-time employment (finding), chronic kidney disease stage 2 (disorder), not in labor force (finding), limited social contact (finding), chronic kidney disease stage 1 (disorder), primary dental caries (disorder), full-time employment (finding), awaiting transplantation of kidney (situation), gingivitis (disorder), stress (finding), social isolation (finding).

# Social History
Patient is married. Patient has a documented history of opioid addiction. Patient has never smoked.
 Patient identifies as heterosexual.

Patient comes from a middle socioeconomic background.
 Patient has completed some college courses.
Patient currently has Medicare.

# Allergies
No Known Allergies.

# Medications
lisinopril 10 mg oral tablet; 1 ml epoetin alfa 4000 unt/ml injection [epogen]; insulin lispro 100 unt/ml injectable solution [humalog]; sodium fluoride 0.0272 mg/mg oral gel

- Frequent Urination
- Fatigue
- Thirst


# History of Present Illness
Fritz267
 is a 67 year-old nonhispanic native male. Patient has a history of gingival disease (disorder), chronic kidney disease stage 3 (disorder), medication review due (situation), leaking dental filling (finding), drug overdose, victim of intimate partner abuse (finding), chronic kidney disease stage 4 (disorder), part-time employment (finding), chronic kidney disease stage 2 (disorder), not in labor force (finding), limited social contact (finding), chronic kidney disease stage 1 (disorder), primary dental caries (disorder), full-time employment (finding), awaiting transplantation of kidney (situation), gingivitis (disorder), stress (finding), social isolation (finding).

# Social History
Patient is married. Patient has a documented history of opioid addiction. Patient has never smoked.
 Patient identifies as heterosexual.

Patient comes from a middle socioeconomic background.
 Patient has completed some college courses.
Patient currently has Medicare.

# Allergies
No Known Allergies.

# Medications
lisinopril 10 mg oral tablet; 1 ml epoetin alfa 4000 unt/ml injection [epogen]; insulin lispro 100 unt/ml injectable solution [humalog]; sodium fluoride 0.0272 mg/mg oral gel

# Assessment and Plan


## Plan

The following procedures were conducted:
- rehabilitation therapy (regime/therapy)

2018-05-21

# Chief Complaint
- Frequent Urination
- Fatigue
- Thirst


# History of Present Illness
Fritz267
 is a 67 year-old nonhispanic native male. Patient has a history of gingival disease (disorder), chronic kidney disease stage 3 (disorder), medication review due (situation), leaking dental filling (finding), drug overdose, victim of intimate partner abuse (finding), chronic kidney disease stage 4 (disorder), part-time employment (finding), chronic kidney disease stage 2 (disorder), not in labor force (finding), limited social contact (finding), chronic kidney disease stage 1 (disorder), primary dental caries (disorder), full-time employment (finding), awaiting transplantation of kidney (situation), gingivitis (disorder), stress (finding), social isolation (finding).

# Social History
Patient is married. Patient has a documented history of opioid addiction. Patient has never smoked.
 Patient identifies as heterosexual.

Patient comes from a middle socioeconomic background.
 Patient has completed some college courses.
Patient currently has Medicare.

# Allergies
No Known Allergies.

# Medications
lisinopril 10 mg oral tablet; 1 ml epoetin alfa 4000 unt/ml injection [epogen]; insulin lispro 100 unt/ml injectable solution [humalog]; sodium fluoride 0.0272 mg/mg oral gel

# Assessment and Plan


## Plan

The following procedures were conducted:
- dental consultation and report (procedure)
- dental care (regime/therapy)
- removal of supragingival plaque and calculus from all teeth using dental instrument (procedure)
- removal of subgingival plaque and calculus from all teeth using dental instrument (procedure)
- dental plain x-ray bitewing (procedure)
- examination of gingivae (procedure)
- dental fluoride treatment (procedure)
- oral health education (procedure)
The patient was prescribed the following medications:
- sodium fluoride 0.0272 mg/mg oral gel

 is a 66 year-old nonhispanic native male. Patient has a history of gingival disease (disorder), chronic kidney disease stage 3 (disorder), medication review due (situation), leaking dental filling (finding), drug overdose, victim of intimate partner abuse (finding), chronic kidney disease stage 4 (disorder), part-time employment (finding), chronic kidney disease stage 2 (disorder), not in labor force (finding), limited social contact (finding), chronic kidney disease stage 1 (disorder), primary dental caries (disorder), full-time employment (finding), awaiting transplantation of kidney (situation), gingivitis (disorder), stress (finding), social isolation (finding).

# Social History
Patient is married. Patient has a documented history of opioid addiction. Patient has never smoked.
 Patient identifies as heterosexual.

Patient comes from a middle socioeconomic background.
 Patient has completed some college courses.
Patient currently has Medicare.

# Allergies
No Known Allergies.

# Medications
lisinopril 10 mg oral tablet; 1 ml epoetin alfa 4000 unt/ml injection [epogen]; insulin lispro 100 unt/ml injectable solution [humalog]; sodium fluoride 0.0272 mg/mg oral gel

# Assessment and Plan


## Plan

The following procedures were conducted:
- renal dialysis (procedure)
The patient was prescribed the following medications:
- 1 ml epoetin alfa 4000 unt/ml injection [epogen]

Patient has a history of gingival disease (disorder), chronic kidney disease stage 3 (disorder), medication review due (situation), leaking dental filling (finding), drug overdose, chronic kidney disease stage 4 (disorder), part-time employment (finding), chronic kidney disease stage 2 (disorder), not in labor force (finding), limited social contact (finding), chronic kidney disease stage 1 (disorder), primary dental caries (disorder), full-time employment (finding), awaiting transplantation of kidney (situation), gingivitis (disorder), stress (finding), social isolation (finding).

# Social History
Patient is married. Patient has a documented history of opioid addiction. Patient has never smoked.
 Patient identifies as heterosexual.

Patient comes from a middle socioeconomic background.
 Patient has completed some college courses.
Patient currently has Medicare.

# Allergies
No Known Allergies.

# Medications
lisinopril 10 mg oral tablet; 1 ml epoetin alfa 4000 unt/ml injection [epogen]; insulin lispro 100 unt/ml injectable solution [humalog]; sodium fluoride 0.0272 mg/mg oral gel

Patient has a history of gingival disease (disorder), chronic kidney disease stage 3 (disorder), medication review due (situation), leaking dental filling (finding), chronic kidney disease stage 4 (disorder), part-time employment (finding), chronic kidney disease stage 2 (disorder), not in labor force (finding), limited social contact (finding), chronic kidney disease stage 1 (disorder), primary dental caries (disorder), full-time employment (finding), awaiting transplantation of kidney (situation), gingivitis (disorder), stress (finding), social isolation (finding).

# Social History
Patient is married. Patient has a documented history of opioid addiction. Patient has never smoked.
 Patient identifies as heterosexual.

Patient comes from a middle socioeconomic background.
 Patient has completed some college courses.
Patient currently has Medicare.

# Allergies
No Known Allergies.

# Medications
lisinopril 10 mg oral tablet; 1 ml epoetin alfa 4000 unt/ml injection [epogen]; insulin lispro 100 unt/ml injectable solution [humalog]; sodium fluoride 0.0272 mg/mg oral gel

# History of Present Illness

 is a 65 year-old nonhispanic native male.  Patient identifies as heterosexual.

Patient comes from a middle socioeconomic background.
 Patient has completed some college courses.
Patient currently has Medicare.

# Allergies
No Known Allergies.

# Medications
lisinopril 10 mg oral tablet; 1 ml epoetin alfa 4000 unt/ml injection [epogen]; insulin lispro 100 unt/ml injectable solution [humalog]; sodium fluoride 0.0272 mg/mg oral gel

# Assessment and Plan


## Plan

The following procedures were conducted:
- renal dialysis (procedure)
The patient was prescribed the following medications:
- 1 ml epoetin alfa 4000 unt/ml injection [epogen]

- examination of gingivae (procedure)
- dental fluoride treatment (procedure)
- oral health education (procedure)
The patient was prescribed the following medications:
- sodium fluoride 0.0272 mg/mg oral gel

# Assessment and Plan

- dental fluoride treatment (procedure)
- oral health education (procedure)

Fritz267
 is a 50 year-old nonhispanic native male. Patient has a history of chronic kidney disease stage 1 (disorder).

# Social History
Patient is married. Patient has a documented history of opioid addiction. Patient has never smoked.
 Patient identifies as heterosexual.

Patient comes from a middle socioeconomic background.
 Patient has completed some college courses.
Patient currently has NO INSURANCE.

# Allergies
No Known Allergies.

# Medications
No Active Medications.

# Assessment and Plan
Patient is presenting with chronic kidney disease stage 2 (disorder), microalbuminuria due to type 2 diabetes mellitus (disorder).
